questionTitle: I am very ________ in information about your company's holidays.
The meteorologists say we're likely to have a ________ winter.
Do you think Jane and Adam marry ________?
You should ________ a lawyer before you sign that document.
You can take a horse to water, but you can't ________ it drink!
He is a little bit ________ in his left ear, but if you speak clearly he will hear what you say.
Several of the explorers did not survive the terrible ________ across the desert.
Heavy snowfalls have ________ all trains.
The heavy rainstorms ________ more than five days.
There will now be a ________ interval for refreshments.
The play was very long, but there were two ________.
The stolen jewels were ________ a lot of money.
They had a plan to trick him, but he didn't fall ________ it.
It is unreasonable to demand this ________ him.
It took me a long time to get rid ________ him.
They differ ________ each other so much.
There is little ________ in this department.
I would not let him go, if I ________ all about this trip.
They were ________ for smuggling jewelry into the country.
At first, very few people believed Darwin's theory of evolution because it did not seem at all ________.
